item.title: Açorda
item.description: Ingredientes 3 Dentes de alho 1 dl de azeite 1 l de água 4 ovos Pão Segurelha Sal Modo de fazer Pise os dentes de alho e põem-se numa panela com o azeite, o sal, a segurelha e a água. Leve ao lume a ferver um pouco e, de seguida, deita-se os ovos, até coagular a clara. Tire e coloque num prato. Corte para uma terrina o pão e regue com o caldo a ferver.

item.title: Bifes de lentilhas
item.description: Ingredientes Bife: 1/4 kg de lentilhas 2 dentes de alho 1 folha de louro 1 cebola picada 1 pacote de flocos de aveia sal q.b. Fritar: 1 Ovo 1 dente de alho óleo q.b. margarina q.b. Molho: Alho q.b. Louro q.b. Sal q.b. Vinho (pouco) Água da cozedura das lentilhas Modo de fazer Pomos as lentilhas de molho (de véspera) depois coze-se com sal e a folha de louro.

item.title: Caril Vemelho Tailandês
item.description: Ingredientes 1 colher de sopa de azeite 1 cebola branca pequena cortada às rodelas (cerca de uma chávena) 2 dentes de alho picados ou esmagados 1 colher de sopa de gengibre picado (nó de cerca de 2 cm) 1 pimento amarelo, verde ou vermelho (ou 1 de cada) cortados em tiras finas e compridas 3 cenouras, descascadas e cortadas ao alto em sextos ou oitavos (aproximadamente uma chávena) 2 colheres de sopa de pasta de caril vermelho tailandês (Thai red curry paste)

item.title: Coconut Lentil Curry with Greens
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups uncooked white or brown basmati rice, to serve 2 cups brown or green lentils 8 cups chopped leafy greens: spinach, kale, or chard 1 tablespoon olive oil 15-ounce can coconut milk 3 tablespoons Thai red curry paste 2 tablespoons tomato paste 1 teaspoon kosher salt Fresh ground black pepper Instructions Make the rice according to How to Cook Basmati Rice (or Instant Pot Rice). Place the lentils in a saucepan with 6 cups warm water.

item.title: Croquetes de Lentilhas
item.description: Ingredientes 2 chávenas de lentilhas cozidas amassadas 1 chávena de migalhas de pão integral ou de pão ralado 1/2 chávena de germén de trigo 1/2 cebola ralada sal q.b. farinha de trigo q.b. óleo q.b. Modo de Fazer Misturar as lentilhas, o pão, o germén, a cebola e o sal, envolvendo até ficar homogéneo. Depois moldar em croquetes, passar na farinha e fritar.

item.title: Curried Red Lentil and Pumpkin Soup
item.description: Ingredients 1 Tbsp olive oil 1 yellow onion 2 cloves garlic 1 Tbsp grated fresh ginger 15 oz. can pumpkin purée 1 cup dry red lentils 6 cups vegetable or chicken broth 1 Tbsp curry powder (or to taste) Instructions Dice the onion, mince the garlic, and grate the ginger (use a small hole cheese grater). Sauté the onion, garlic, and ginger in a large pot with the olive oil over medium heat until the onions are soft and transparent.

item.title: Indian Red Lentil Dal
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup red lentils, rinsed 1 tablespoon vegetable oil 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds 1 (2-inch) cinnamon stick 1 cup diced yellow onion 1 green chili pepper, stemmed, seeded, and minced (serrano for spicy, jalapeno for more mild) 4 garlic cloves, minced 1 tablespoon finely minced ginger root 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric 1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom 1/2 teaspoon paprika 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt 1 medium tomato, diced Juice of one half a lemon

item.title: Lentil and Egg Stew
item.description: Ingredients 1 large onion, chopped 1 fennel bulb, chopped 3 medium carrots, peeled, chopped 6 garlic cloves, 5 finely chopped, 1 whole ¼ cup olive oil, plus more for frying Kosher salt 1 tablespoon tomato paste 2 cups French or black beluga lentils 1 3x2-inch piece Parmesan rind 1 bunch large spinach, tough stems trimmed 4 large eggs 4 large slices country-style bread Red wine vinegar and grated Pecorino (for serving)

item.title: Lentil Soup
item.description: Ingredients ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil 1 medium yellow or white onion, chopped 2 carrots, peeled and chopped 4 garlic cloves, pressed or minced 2 teaspoons ground cumin 1 teaspoon curry powder ½ teaspoon dried thyme 1 large can (28 ounces) diced tomatoes, lightly drained 1 cup brown or green lentils, picked over and rinsed 4 cups vegetable broth 2 cups water 1 teaspoon salt, more to taste Pinch of red pepper flakes

item.title: Lentilhas cremosas com tomate e espinafres
item.description: Ingredientes 4 dentes de alho 2 cebolas medias 3 cm de gengibre 1 lata leite de côco 800 gr de tomate bocados 400 gr lentilhas castanhas/verdes secas (~800 gr cozidas) 170 gr de espinafres bébé 2 colheres de chá de coentros 2 colheres de chá de cominhos 1 colher de chá de açúcar (opcional para cortar a acidez do tomate) 1 folha de louro sal q.b. Modo de Fazer Lavar e cozer as lentilhas à parte com o louro em água abundante e sal q.

item.title: Minestrone
item.description: Ingredients 4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided 1 medium yellow onion, chopped 2 medium carrots, peeled and chopped 2 medium ribs celery, chopped ¼ cup tomato paste 2 cups chopped seasonal vegetables (potatoes, yellow squash, zucchini, butternut squash, green beans or peas all work) 4 cloves garlic, pressed or minced ½ teaspoon dried oregano ½ teaspoon dried thyme 1 large can (28 ounces) diced tomatoes, with their liquid (or 2 small 15-ounce cans)

item.title: Pinto Posole
item.description: Ingredients 2 to 4 guajillo chili peppers* 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 1 large white onion, finely chopped 4 cloves garlic, pressed or minced 1 tablespoon ground cumin 1/2 cup (4 ounces) tomato paste 1 bay leaf 3 cans (15 ounces each) pinto beans, rinsed and drained 1 can (15 ounces) hominy, rinsed and drained 32 ounces (4 cups) vegetable broth 2 cups water 1/2 teaspoon fine sea salt, to taste

item.title: Potato Black Bean Burgers
item.description: Ingredients 1 ½ pounds sweet potatoes (smaller potatoes cook faster) ⅓ cup uncooked millet or quinoa (or 1 cup cooked) 1 cup old fashioned oats (use certified gluten-free oats if you are avoiding gluten) 1 can (15 ounces) black beans, rinsed and drained (or 2 cups cooked black beans) ½ small red onion, diced ½ cup lightly packed fresh cilantro leaves, chopped 2 teaspoons cumin powder 1 teaspoon chili powder

item.title: Red Curry
item.description: Ingredients 1 ¼ cups brown jasmine rice or long-grain brown rice, rinsed 1 tablespoon coconut oil or olive oil 1 small white onion, chopped (about 1 cup) Pinch of salt, more to taste 1 tablespoon finely grated fresh ginger (about a 1-inch nub of ginger) 2 cloves garlic, pressed or minced 1 red bell pepper, sliced into thin 2-inch long strips 1 yellow, orange or green bell pepper, sliced into thin 2-inch long strips

item.title: Red Lentil Curry (Ethiopian Lentils)
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups uncooked rice 1 red onion 2 cloves garlic 1 ½ tablespoons minced ginger root 3 tablespoons olive oil 2 tablespoons paprika 1 teaspoon turmeric ½ teaspoon ground cardamom 15-ounce can diced tomatoes 2 cups red lentils 5 cups water 1 teaspoon kosher salt 1/2 teaspoon black pepper A few pinches (or more) cayenne Instructions Prepare the rice according to the package instructions or use our Instant Pot method.

item.title: Sopa de Tomate e Cebola II
item.description: Ingredientes Cebola q.b. Tomate q.b. Manteiga q.b. Alho q.b. Sal q.b. Segurelha q.b. Ovos q.b. Modo de fazer Pique a cebola, o tomate e o alho em bocadinhos e refogue com a manteiga e um pouco de azeite. Quando estiver bem refogado junte a água necessária. Deixe ferver e apurar o gosto. Deite os ovos, um a um, para escalfá-los. No momento de servir coloque um raminho de segurelha em cada prato.

item.title: Vegetarian Chili
item.description: Ingredients 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 1 medium red onion, chopped 1 large red bell pepper, chopped 2 medium carrots, chopped 2 ribs celery, chopped ½ teaspoon salt, divided 4 cloves garlic, pressed or minced 2 tablespoons chili powder* 2 teaspoons ground cumin 1 ½ teaspoons smoked paprika* 1 teaspoon dried oregano 1 large can (28 ounces) or 2 small cans (15 ounces each) diced tomatoes**, with their juices 2 cans (15 ounces each) black beans, rinsed and drained
